name: SkyOutlaw
description:
You play as an outlaw aircraft pilot in the island of Ethis, your objective is to dominate the isle with your pilot skills, to do that you must  gather ressources and upgrade your base but be aware of the other outlaws , who will try to kill you and what you built.

Actually, there is only one scenario, which consist of destroy SAM vehicles (Surface to air missile) on a little island.

Controls : 

Z or W to pitch up

S to pitch down

Q or A to roll left

D to roll right

Space Bar to launch a missile

Left Shift to increase speed

Left Ctrl to decrease speed

T to change the target
